ColourWords.Title: any/every/no/some
ColourWords.Instruction: One word in each sentence is wrong. Click on the incorrect word.

Content.Sentence:
1 I knocked on any door in the street but nobody seemed to be at home.
2 Everybody in our class are taking the First Certificate exam.
3 Excuse me. I'm looking for MP3 players; do you have every in the shop?
4 She told me there's anything really good on TV tonight.
5 In my town there are nowhere to buy groceries in the evening.
6 Can you get me an ice-cream? All of them will be fine.
7 We don't have some jackets in your size I'm afraid.
8 In my country no people don't have to do military service.
9 I can't find some milk in your fridge.
10 Can you help me? Something on my computer don't work properly.
